name: Bubble Bunny Rabbit
description:
Bubble Bunny Rabbit is coming along with new designed play mode, there are over 500 amazing levels to beat. Drag your finger to move the laser to the direction. Be cautious! you can tap the bubble to change its color. Come and give it a shot, you will find endless fun!
Features;
- Unlock different powerful boosters to help you pass the tricky levels
- Exquisite game interface
- Completely free to play at anywhere and anytime
- Match at least 3 bubbles to create supercharged matches
- With uniquely challenging obstacles
